title: Baseline
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061238/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061238/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Baseline**

The imaginary line on which the [base](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061238/http:/typophile.com/wiki/base) of [capital](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061238/http:/typophile.com/wiki/capital) letters rests.
author: paul d hunt
